title: Bronze III looking for duo partner
body:
I'm just an edgy teenager who's bad at the game and wants to climb. I'm a mid Lux main, even though my best role is a tank (cc-heavy) support. Looking for an ADC (honestly, role doesn't matter, just carry my ass out of bronze pls {{champion:32}}) in similar elo.

If you for some reason want to carry an escaped chimpanzee who stole a tourist's pc and figured out how to turn on league, add me ingame or leave a comment :P

replies.body: hi im a bronze 2 jg main and I barely play ranked but I did a game a week ago and won 4v5 so Iâ€™ll duo with you
